name: access-token
description: A signed access token describing client authorization, scope, constraints, and validity period.

fields.name: issuer
fields.description: The identifier of the token issuer.

fields.name: issued
fields.description: The date and time the token was issued.

fields.name: audience
fields.description: A list of audience identifiers for which the token is valid.

fields.name: not-before
fields.description: The token is not valid before this date and time.

fields.name: not-after
fields.description: The token is not valid after this date and time.

fields.name: client
fields.description: The identifier of the client to which the token applies.

fields.name: constraint
fields.description: Constraints on origin and authentication requirements for using the token.

fields.name: scope
fields.description: The authorization scope granted by the token.

fields.name: key-id
fields.description: Identifier of the signing key used to create the token.

fields.name: signature
fields.description: The cryptographic signature of the token.
